db:abstract.db:para: Provides public API shared by both QtWebEngineQuick and QtWebEngineWidgets.
This module was introduced in Qt 5.6.

db:article.db:para: Provides public API shared by both QtWebEngineQuick and QtWebEngineWidgets.
This module was introduced in Qt 5.6.

db:listitem.db:para: The QWebEngineCertificateError class provides information about a certificate error.
The QWebEngineClientCertSelection class wraps a client certificate selection.
The QWebEngineClientCertificateStore class provides an in-memory store for client certificates.
The QWebEngineContextMenuRequest class provides request for populating or extending a context menu with actions.
The QWebEngineCookieStore class provides access to Chromium's cookies.
The QWebEngineCookieStore::FilterRequest struct is used in conjunction with QWebEngineCookieStore::setCookieFilter() and is the type filterCallback operates on.
The QWebEngineDownloadRequest class provides information about a download.
The QWebEngineFileSystemAccessRequest class enables accepting or rejecting requests for local file system access from JavaScript applications.
The QWebEngineFindTextResult class encapsulates the result of a string search on a page.
The QWebEngineFullScreenRequest class enables accepting or rejecting requests for entering and exiting the fullscreen mode.
The QWebEngineHistory class represents the history of a web engine page.
The QWebEngineHistoryItem class represents one item in the history of a web engine page.
A data model that represents the history of a web engine page.
The QWebEngineHttpRequest class holds a request to be sent with WebEngine.
A utility type for the WebEngineView::loadingChanged signal.
A utility type for the QWebEnginePage::navigationRequested signal.
A utility type for the QWebEnginePage::newWindowRequested() signal.
The QWebEngineNotification class encapsulates the data of an HTML5 web notification.
The QWebEnginePage class provides an object to view and edit web documents.
The QWebEngineProfile class provides a web engine profile shared by multiple pages.
The QWebEngineQuotaRequest class enables accepting or rejecting requests for larger persistent storage than the application's current allocation in File System API.
The QWebEngineRegisterProtocolHandlerRequest class enables accepting or rejecting requests from the registerProtocolHandler API.
The QWebEngineScript class encapsulates a JavaScript program.
The QWebEngineScriptCollection class represents a collection of user scripts.
The QWebEngineSettings class provides an object to store the settings used by QWebEnginePage.
The QWebEngineUrlRequestInfo class provides information about URL requests.
The QWebEngineUrlRequestInterceptor class provides an abstract base class for URL interception.
The QWebEngineUrlRequestJob class represents a custom URL request.
The QWebEngineUrlScheme class configures a custom URL scheme.
The QWebEngineUrlSchemeHandler class is a base class for handling custom URL schemes.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: If you use qmake to build your projects, Qt WebEngine Core is usually indirectly included through the Qt WebEngine Quick or Qt WebEngine Widgets modules.
To link against the module using build with qmake, add this line to your qmake project file:
However, webenginecore is implied by adding webenginequick or webenginewidgets.
For build with CMake use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package and target_link_libraries() to link against the module:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS WebEngineCore) target_link_libraries(target PRIVATE Qt::WebEngineCore)
